name: Draft Tutor
description:
From the same people that brought 21Damage, now we have Draft Tutor: A simple timer, custom made to help playgroups improve their booster draft experience.

Features:

- Draft Timer.
- Draft Direction.
- Current Pack/Pick pair.
- Pause/Restart(Stop) current draft.
- Link on App to WoTC's website on the format.
- Dark Mode.

All the sales of this app help us keep 21 Damage and future apps free!
